title: The Taliban destroyed these ancient Buddhas. Now they're welcoming tourists to the site.

content:

description: Iraq's Prime Minister Mustafa al-Kadhimi is unharmed after an assassination attempt with an armed drone that targeted his residence Sunday, officials said.
content:
